Parses out the 3 components from a deferred action.

## Import

```ts
import { parseDeferredAction } from "@alchemy/smart-accounts";
```

## Parameters

### deferredAction

`Hex`

- The deferred action to parse.

## Returns

`object`
The parsed deferred action.
